ARTICLE 1: OBJECT AND TERM OF RENTAL
 - Party A agrees to rent the room to Party B and Party B agrees to rent the room according to the information stated above.
 - Rental period: 06 months from the date of signing the contract.


ARTICLE 2: RENTAL PRICE AND PAYMENT METHOD
 - Room rent is paid on the 5th of each month.
 - Electricity bill: Calculated by separate meter, unit price according to electricity regulations.
 - Water bill: Calculated by separate meter or agreed rate.
 - The deposit will be refunded upon termination of the contract if there is no property damage.


ARTICLE 3: RESPONSIBILITIES OF PARTY A
 - Ensure the legal right to use the room for Party B.
 - Repair any damage not caused by Party B.
 - Notify at least 30 days in advance if there is any change in the rental price.


ARTICLE 4: RESPONSIBILITIES OF PARTY B
 - Use the room for the right purpose, keep it clean.
 - Pay the rent and service fees in full and on time.
 - Do not arbitrarily repair or renovate the room without the consent of Party A.
 - Notify 30 days in advance if you want to terminate the contract before the deadline.


ARTICLE 5: TERMINATION OF THE CONTRACT
 - The contract terminates in the following cases:
 + The lease term expires
 + The two parties agree to terminate the contract
 + Serious violation of the agreed terms


ARTICLE 6: GENERAL PROVISIONS
 - The two parties commit to comply with the terms of the contract.
 - Any disputes will be resolved in a spirit of reconciliation.
 - The contract is effective from the date of confirmation by both parties.
